translation.about1: Web developer focused on frontend development since 2022
translation.about3: Looking for an opportunity to work as a developer
translation.quizDescription: A front-end quiz with questions about HTML, CSS, JavaScript and React. In this project I worked with componentization and not with React Dom, that is, there are no external dependencies on React.
translation.calcDescription: The BMI calculator helps you understand whether your weight is within the ideal range for your height. Made with React, this project provides the functionality to see your index and situation and compare it with the BMI table.
